api_list.name: Get All Leagues
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-api68.p.rapidapi.com/allLeagues"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-api68.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
